Question: Zhongyin (Ningbo) Battery Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhongyin (Ningbo) Battery Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Zhongyin (Ningbo) Battery Co., Ltd. is a leading alkaline battery manufacturer for retail and commercial markets.
- Offers a full range of batteries including alkaline, carbon zinc, lithium, rechargeable, specialty batteries, and flashlights.
- Production capacity of up to 5.0 billion pcs/year, with 25% of alkaline batteries exported from China produced in their factory.
- Specializes in OEM&ODM services, serving clients in over 80 countries and regions.
- Certifications include ISO9001, ISO14001, SWAN ecolabel, CNAS certified R&D Laboratory, SCAN, BSCI, SNI, and more.
- The company has a factory in Vietnam and is one of the five IEC permanent members.
- The company emphasizes environmental-friendly products and has a strong scientific research ability.
- The Research & Development Center of Electrochemical Power Engineering Technical is one of the largest laboratories in Zhejiang province.
- Zhongyin (Ningbo) Battery Co., Ltd. has invested heavily in research and development, equipment innovation, quality and control management, recruitment, staffing, and training.
- Contact: sale@sonluk.com, Tel: +86-574-87491087, Fax: +86-574-87493903
Summary_cn:
中印（宁波）电池有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 中印（宁波）电池有限公司是零售和商业市场的领先碱性电池制造商。
- 提供全系列电池，包括碱性、碳锌、锂、可充电、特种电池和手电筒。
- 年产能达50亿只，其中25%的碱性电池出口自中国由他们的工厂生产。
- 专注于OEM和ODM服务，服务于80多个国家和地区的客户。
- 认证包括ISO9001、ISO14001、SWAN生态标志、CNAS认证的研发实验室、SCAN、BSCI、SNI等。
- 公司在越南设有工厂，是国际电工委员会（IEC）的五个永久会员之一。
- 公司强调环保产品，拥有强大的科研能力。
- 电化学动力工程技术研究与开发中心是浙江省最大的实验室之一。
- 中印（宁波）电池有限公司在研发、设备创新、质量和控制管理、招聘、员工配置和培训方面投入巨资。
- 联系方式：sale@sonluk.com，电话：+86-574-87491087，传真：+86-574-87493903
